Logger#

module: spk2py/spk_logging/__init__.py

Initialization of the module logger.

spk2py.spk_logging.configure_logger(name, log_file: Path | str, level=20)#

Configure a logger with file and stream handlers.

Parameters:
namestr

Name of the logger.

log_filePath | str

Path to the log file.

levelint, optional

Logging level, by default logging.INFO

Returns:
logging.Logger

Configured logger object.
